data.eml:eml: A new species of Capnia (Plecoptera: Capniidae) from Lesser Khingan Range (Amur River Basin, Far East of Russia)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Teslenko, Valentina A. (2019): A new species of Capnia (Plecoptera: Capniidae) from Lesser Khingan Range (Amur River Basin, Far East of Russia). Zootaxa 4674 (4): 463-470, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4674.4.5
